                "file_text": "#!/bin/bash\n# 图片压缩脚本\n# 用法: bash scripts/image-pipeline/compress-images.sh\n\nset -e\n\nSCRIPT_DIR=\"$(cd \"$(dirname \"${BASH_SOURCE[0]}\")\" && pwd)\"\nINPUT_DIR=\"$SCRIPT_DIR/../../generated-images\"\nOUTPUT_DIR=\"$SCRIPT_DIR/../../compressed\"\n\n# 颜色输出\nGREEN='\\033[0;32m'\nYELLOW='\\033[1;33m'\nNC='\\033[0m'\n\nmkdir -p \"$OUTPUT_DIR\"\n\necho -e \"${GREEN}🗜️ 开始压缩图片...${NC}\"\necho \"输入目录: $INPUT_DIR\"\necho \"输出目录: $OUTPUT_DIR\"\necho \"\"\n\n# 检查依赖\ncheck_deps() {\n  local missing=()\n\n  if ! command -v convert &> /dev/null; then\n    missing+=(\"ImageMagick (brew install imagemagick)\")\n  fi\n\n  if ! command -v pngquant &> /dev/null; then\n    missing+=(\"pngquant (brew install pngquant)\")\n  fi\n\n  if [ ${#missing[@]} -gt 0 ]; then\n    echo -e \"${YELLOW}⚠️ 缺少依赖:${NC}\"\n    for dep in \"${missing[@]}\"; do\n      echo \"  - $dep\"\n    done\n    echo \"\"\n    echo \"将使用基础复制模式...\"\n    return 1\n  fi\n  return 0\n}\n\n# 压缩 JPG（封面）\ncompress_jpg() {\n  local input=\"$1\"\n  local output=\"$2\"\n\n  if command -v convert &> /dev/null; then\n    convert \"$input\" -quality 85 -resize \"1200x630>\" \"$output\"\n  else\n    cp \"$input\" \"$output\"\n  fi\n}\n\n# 压缩 PNG（内页）\ncompress_png() {\n  local input=\"$1\"\n  local output=\"$2\"\n\n  if command -v pngquant &> /dev/null; then\n    pngquant --quality=65-80 --output \"$output\" \"$input\" 2>/dev/null || cp \"$input\" \"$output\"\n  else\n    cp \"$input\" \"$output\"\n  fi\n}\n\n# 规范化文件名（小写、连字符）\nnormalize_filename() {\n  echo \"$1\" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]' | tr ' ' '-'\n}\n\n# 主处理\nprocess_images() {\n  local count=0\n  local total_before=0\n  local total_after=0\n\n  # 处理封面（JPG）\n  for img in \"$INPUT_DIR\"/*-cover.{jpg,jpeg,JPG,JPEG} 2>/dev/null; do\n    [ -f \"$img\" ] || continue\n\n    local filename=$(basename \"$img\")\n    local normalized=$(normalize_filename \"${filename%.*}-cover.jpg\")\n    local output=\"$OUTPUT_DIR/$normalized\"\n\n    local before_size=$(stat -f%z \"$img\" 2>/dev/null || stat -c%s \"$img\")\n    compress_jpg \"$img\" \"$output\"\n    local after_size=$(stat -f%z \"$output\" 2>/dev/null || stat -c%s \"$output\")\n\n    total_before=$((total_before + before_size))\n    total_after=$((total_after + after_size))\n    count=$((count + 1))\n\n    local before_kb=$((before_size / 1024))\n    local after_kb=$((after_size / 1024))\n    echo -e \"${GREEN}✅${NC} $normalized: ${before_kb}KB -> ${after_kb}KB\"\n  done\n\n  # 处理内页（PNG）\n  for img in \"$INPUT_DIR\"/*.png \"$INPUT_DIR\"/*.PNG 2>/dev/null; do\n    [ -f \"$img\" ] || continue\n    [[ \"$img\" == *\"-cover\"* ]] && continue\n\n    local filename=$(basename \"$img\")\n    local normalized=$(normalize_filename \"$filename\")\n    local output=\"$OUTPUT_DIR/$normalized\"\n\n    local before_size=$(stat -f%z \"$img\" 2>/dev/null || stat -c%s \"$img\")\n    compress_png \"$img\" \"$output\"\n    local after_size=$(stat -f%z \"$output\" 2>/dev/null || stat -c%s \"$output\")\n\n    total_before=$((total_before + before_size))\n    total_after=$((total_after + after_size))\n    count=$((count + 1))\n\n    local before_kb=$((before_size / 1024))\n    local after_kb=$((after_size / 1024))\n    echo -e \"${GREEN}✅${NC} $normalized: ${before_kb}KB -> ${after_kb}KB\"\n  done\n\n  echo \"\"\n  echo -e \"${GREEN}📊 压缩完成${NC}\"\n  echo \"处理文件: $count 个\"\n\n  if [ $total_before -gt 0 ]; then\n    local before_mb=$((total_before / 1024 / 1024))\n    local after_mb=$((total_after / 1024 / 1024))\n    local saved=$((total_before - total_after))\n    local saved_mb=$((saved / 1024 / 1024))\n    local percent=$((saved * 100 / total_before))\n    echo \"压缩前: ${before_mb}MB\"\n    echo \"压缩后: ${after_mb}MB\"\n    echo \"节省: ${saved_mb}MB (${percent}%)\"\n  fi\n}\n\n# 主函数\nmain() {\n  if [ ! -d \"$INPUT_DIR\" ] || [ -z \"$(ls -A \"$INPUT_DIR\" 2>/dev/null)\" ]; then\n    echo -e \"${YELLOW}⚠️ generated-images 目录为空${NC}\"\n    echo \"请先生成图片\"\n    exit 0\n  fi\n\n  check_deps || true\n  process_images\n}\n\nmain\n"

                "command": "create",
                "file_text": "/**\n * 显示图片生成进度\n * \n * 用法: npx tsx scripts/image-pipeline/show-progress.ts\n */\n\nimport * as fs from 'node:fs';\nimport * as path from 'node:path';\nimport type { ImageTasksData } from './types';\nimport { calculateProgress } from './types';\n\nconst CONFIG = {\n  dataDir: path.resolve(__dirname, '../../data'),\n  tasksFile: 'image-tasks.json',\n};\n\nfunction main() {\n  const tasksPath = path.join(CONFIG.dataDir, CONFIG.tasksFile);\n\n  if (!fs.existsSync(tasksPath)) {\n    console.error('❌ 任务文件不存在，请先运行 generate-prompts.ts');\n    process.exit(1);\n  }\n\n  const data: ImageTasksData = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(tasksPath, 'utf-8'));\n  const progress = calculateProgress(data.tasks);\n\n  console.log('📊 图片生成进度');\n  console.log('================');\n  console.log('');\n\n  // 封面进度\n  const coverDone = progress.coverApproved + progress.coverUploaded;\n  const coverPercent = Math.round((coverDone / progress.total) * 100);\n  console.log('🖼️  封面图:');\n  console.log(`   待处理: ${progress.coverPending}`);\n  console.log(`   已生成: ${progress.coverGenerated}`);\n  console.log(`   已审核: ${progress.coverApproved}`);\n  console.log(`   已上传: ${progress.coverUploaded}`);\n  console.log(`   完成率: ${coverDone}/${progress.total} (${coverPercent}%)`);\n  console.log('');\n\n  // 内页进度\n  const totalInline = progress.inlinePending + progress.inlineGenerated + progress.inlineApproved + progress.inlineUploaded;\n  const inlineDone = progress.inlineApproved + progress.inlineUploaded;\n  const inlinePercent = totalInline > 0 ? Math.round((inlineDone / totalInline) * 100) : 0;\n  console.log('📄 内页图:');\n  console.log(`   待处理: ${progress.inlinePending}`);\n  console.log(`   已生成: ${progress.inlineGenerated}`);\n  console.log(`   已审核: ${progress.inlineApproved}`);\n  console.log(`   已上传: ${progress.inlineUploaded}`);\n  console.log(`   完成率: ${inlineDone}/${totalInline} (${inlinePercent}%)`);\n  console.log('');\n\n  // 整体状态\n  console.log('📦 整体状态:');\n  console.log(`   未开始: ${progress.mediaStatusNone}`);\n  console.log(`   进行中: ${progress.mediaStatusPartial}`);\n  console.log(`   已完成: ${progress.mediaStatusDone}`);\n  console.log('');\n\n  // 进度条\n  const barWidth = 30;\n  const coverBar = '█'.repeat(Math.round(coverPercent / 100 * barWidth)) + '░'.repeat(barWidth - Math.round(coverPercent / 100 * barWidth));\n  const inlineBar = '█'.repeat(Math.round(inlinePercent / 100 * barWidth)) + '░'.repeat(barWidth - Math.round(inlinePercent / 100 * barWidth));\n\n  console.log('📈 进度条:');\n  console.log(`   封面: [${coverBar}] ${coverPercent}%`);\n  console.log(`   内页: [${inlineBar}] ${inlinePercent}%`);\n  console.log('');\n\n  // 按分类统计\n  const byCategory = new Map<string, { total: number; done: number }>();\n  for (const task of data.tasks) {\n    const cat = task.category;\n    if (!byCategory.has(cat)) byCategory.set(cat, { total: 0, done: 0 });\n    const stats = byCategory.get(cat)!;\n    stats.total++;\n    if (task.mediaStatus === 'done') stats.done++;\n  }\n\n  console.log('📁 分类统计:');\n  for (const [cat, stats] of byCategory) {\n    const percent = Math.round((stats.done / stats.total) * 100);\n    console.log(`   ${cat}: ${stats.done}/${stats.total} (${percent}%)`);\n  }\n}\n\nmain();\n"

                "file_text": "#!/bin/bash\n# S3 上传脚本\n# 用法: bash scripts/image-pipeline/upload-to-s3.sh\n\nset -e\n\nSCRIPT_DIR=\"$(cd \"$(dirname \"${BASH_SOURCE[0]}\")\" && pwd)\"\nCOMPRESSED_DIR=\"$SCRIPT_DIR/../../compressed\"\nPUBLIC_DIR=\"$SCRIPT_DIR/../../../../public/images/blog\"\nDATA_DIR=\"$SCRIPT_DIR/../../data\"\nTASKS_FILE=\"$DATA_DIR/image-tasks.json\"\n\n# 颜色输出\nGREEN='\\033[0;32m'\nYELLOW='\\033[1;33m'\nRED='\\033[0;31m'\nNC='\\033[0m'\n\necho -e \"${GREEN}☁️ 图片上传流程${NC}\"\necho \"====================\"\necho \"\"\n\n# 步骤 1: 复制到 public 目录\ncopy_to_public() {\n  echo -e \"${GREEN}📁 步骤 1: 复制到 public/images/blog/${NC}\"\n\n  mkdir -p \"$PUBLIC_DIR\"\n\n  if [ ! -d \"$COMPRESSED_DIR\" ] || [ -z \"$(ls -A \"$COMPRESSED_DIR\" 2>/dev/null)\" ]; then\n    echo -e \"${YELLOW}⚠️ compressed 目录为空，尝试从 generated-images 复制${NC}\"\n    COMPRESSED_DIR=\"$SCRIPT_DIR/../../generated-images\"\n  fi\n\n  if [ ! -d \"$COMPRESSED_DIR\" ] || [ -z \"$(ls -A \"$COMPRESSED_DIR\" 2>/dev/null)\" ]; then\n    echo -e \"${RED}❌ 没有可复制的图片${NC}\"\n    return 1\n  fi\n\n  local count=0\n  for img in \"$COMPRESSED_DIR\"/*.{jpg,jpeg,png,JPG,JPEG,PNG} 2>/dev/null; do\n    [ -f \"$img\" ] || continue\n    local filename=$(basename \"$img\")\n    cp \"$img\" \"$PUBLIC_DIR/$filename\"\n    count=$((count + 1))\n  done\n\n  echo \"✅ 已复制 $count 个文件到 public/images/blog/\"\n  echo \"\"\n}\n\n# 步骤 2: 上传到 S3\nupload_to_s3() {\n  echo -e \"${GREEN}☁️ 步骤 2: 上传到 S3${NC}\"\n\n  # 检查环境变量\n  if [ -z \"$STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME\" ]; then\n    echo -e \"${YELLOW}⚠️ STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME 未设置${NC}\"\n    echo \"请在 .env.local 中配置 S3 相关环境变量\"\n    echo \"跳过 S3 上传...\"\n    return 0\n  fi\n\n  if ! command -v aws &> /dev/null; then\n    echo -e \"${YELLOW}⚠️ AWS CLI 未安装${NC}\"\n    echo \"安装: brew install awscli\"\n    echo \"跳过 S3 上传...\"\n    return 0\n  fi\n\n  local S3_BUCKET=\"$STORAGE_BUCKET_NAME\"\n  local S3_PREFIX=\"public/images/blog\"\n\n  echo \"Bucket: $S3_BUCKET\"\n  echo \"Prefix: $S3_PREFIX\"\n  echo \"\"\n\n  # 同步到 S3\n  aws s3 sync \"$PUBLIC_DIR/\" \"s3://${S3_BUCKET}/${S3_PREFIX}/\" \\\n    --acl public-read \\\n    --cache-control \"max-age=31536000\" \\\n    --exclude \"*.DS_Store\" \\\n    --exclude \".gitkeep\"\n\n  echo \"\"\n  echo \"✅ S3 上传完成\"\n}\n\n# 步骤 3: 更新任务状态\nupdate_status() {\n  echo -e \"${GREEN}📝 步骤 3: 更新任务状态${NC}\"\n\n  if [ ! -f \"$TASKS_FILE\" ]; then\n    echo -e \"${YELLOW}⚠️ 任务文件不存在，跳过状态更新${NC}\"\n    return 0\n  fi\n\n  if ! command -v jq &> /dev/null; then\n    echo -e \"${YELLOW}⚠️ jq 未安装，跳过状态更新${NC}\"\n    return 0\n  fi\n\n  local timestamp=$(date -u +\"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ\")\n\n  # 将所有 approved 状态更新为 uploaded\n  jq --arg ts \"$timestamp\" '\n    .tasks |= map(\n      if .cover.status == \"approved\" then .cover.status = \"uploaded\" | .cover.uploadedAt = $ts else . end |\n      .inlineImages |= map(\n        if .status == \"approved\" then .status = \"uploaded\" | .uploadedAt = $ts else . end\n      ) |\n      .updatedAt = $ts |\n      # 重新计算 mediaStatus\n      if (.cover.status == \"uploaded\") and ([.inlineImages[] | select(.status == \"uploaded\")] | length >= 3)\n      then .mediaStatus = \"done\"\n      elif (.cover.status == \"uploaded\") or ([.inlineImages[] | select(.status == \"uploaded\")] | length > 0)\n      then .mediaStatus = \"partial\"\n      else .mediaStatus = \"none\"\n      end\n    )\n  ' \"$TASKS_FILE\" > \"$TASKS_FILE.tmp\" && mv \"$TASKS_FILE.tmp\" \"$TASKS_FILE\"\n\n  echo \"✅ 状态已更新\"\n}\n\n# 主函数\nmain() {\n  copy_to_public\n  upload_to_s3\n  update_status\n\n  echo \"\"\n  echo -e \"${GREEN}🎉 上传流程完成${NC}\"\n  echo \"\"\n  echo \"下一步:\"\n  echo \"  1. 运行 npx tsx scripts/image-pipeline/update-mdx.ts 更新 MDX 文件\"\n  echo \"  2. 运行 npx tsx scripts/image-pipeline/show-progress.ts 查看进度\"\n}\n\nmain\n"
              },

-f \"$TASKS_FILE\" ]; then\n    echo -e \"${YELLOW}⚠️ 任务文件不存在，跳过状态更新${NC}\"\n    return 0\n  fi\n\n  if ! command -v jq &> /dev/null; then\n    echo -e \"${YELLOW}⚠️ jq 未安装，跳过状态更新${NC}\"\n    return 0\n  fi\n\n  local timestamp=$(date -u +\"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ\")\n\n  # 将所有 approved 状态更新为 uploaded\n  jq --arg ts \"$timestamp\" '\n    .tasks |= map(\n      if .cover.status == \"approved\" then .cover.status = \"uploaded\" | .cover.uploadedAt = $ts else . end |\n      .inlineImages |= map(\n        if .status == \"approved\" then .status = \"uploaded\" | .uploadedAt = $ts else . end\n      ) |\n      .updatedAt = $ts |\n      # 重新计算 mediaStatus\n      if (.cover.status == \"uploaded\") and ([.inlineImages[] | select(.status == \"uploaded\")] | length >= 3)\n      then .mediaStatus = \"done\"\n      elif (.cover.status == \"uploaded\") or ([.inlineImages[] | select(.status == \"uploaded\")] | length > 0)\n      then .mediaStatus = \"partial\"\n      else .mediaStatus = \"none\"\n      end\n    )\n  ' \"$TASKS_FILE\" > \"$TASKS_FILE.tmp\" && mv \"$TASKS_FILE.tmp\" \"$TASKS_FILE\"\n\n  echo \"✅ 状态已更新\"\n}\n\n# 主函数\nmain() {\n  copy_to_public\n  upload_to_s3\n  update_status\n\n  echo \"\"\n  echo -e \"${GREEN}🎉 上传流程完成${NC}\"\n  echo \"\"\n  echo \"下一步:\"\n  echo \"  1. 运行 npx tsx scripts/image-pipeline/update-mdx.ts 更新 MDX 文件\"\n  echo \"  2. 运行 npx tsx scripts/image-pipeline/show-progress.ts 查看进度\"\n}\n\nmain\n"
              }

                "command": "create",
                "file_text": "/**\n * 图片质量检查脚本\n * \n * 用法: npx tsx scripts/image-pipeline/check-quality.ts\n */\n\nimport * as fs from 'node:fs';\nimport * as path from 'node:path';\nimport { execSync } from 'node:child_process';\nimport type { ImageTasksData } from './types';\n\nconst CONFIG = {\n  dataDir: path.resolve(__dirname, '../../data'),\n  publicDir: path.resolve(__dirname, '../../../../public/images/blog'),\n  compressedDir: path.resolve(__dirname, '../../compressed'),\n  generatedDir: path.resolve(__dirname, '../../generated-images'),\n  tasksFile: 'image-tasks.json',\n  // 质量标准\n  coverMaxSize: 200 * 1024, // 200KB\n  coverWidth: 1200,\n  coverHeight: 630,\n  inlineMaxSize: 150 * 1024, // 150KB\n  inlineWidth: 1000,\n  inlineHeight: 600,\n};\n\ninterface QualityIssue {\n  file: string;\n  issues: string[];\n}\n\nfunction getImageDimensions(filePath: string): { width: number; height: number } | null {\n  try {\n    // 尝试使用 sips (macOS)\n    const output = execSync(`sips -g pixelWidth -g pixelHeight \"${filePath}\" 2>/dev/null`, {\n      encoding: 'utf-8',\n    });\n    const widthMatch = output.match(/pixelWidth:\\s*(\\d+)/);\n    const heightMatch = output.match(/pixelHeight:\\s*(\\d+)/);\n    if (widthMatch && heightMatch) {\n      return {\n        width: parseInt(widthMatch[1], 10),\n        height: parseInt(heightMatch[1], 10),\n      };\n    }\n  } catch {\n    // sips 不可用，跳过尺寸检查\n  }\n  return null;\n}\n\nfunction findImageFile(filename: string): string | null {\n  const dirs = [CONFIG.publicDir, CONFIG.compressedDir, CONFIG.generatedDir];\n  for (const dir of dirs) {\n    const filePath = path.join(dir, filename);\n    if (fs.existsSync(filePath)) return filePath;\n  }\n  return null;\n}\n\nfunction checkImage(\n  filename: string,\n  isCover: boolean\n): { exists: boolean; issues: string[] } {\n  const issues: string[] = [];\n  const filePath = findImageFile(filename);\n\n  if (!filePath) {\n    return { exists: false, issues: ['文件不存在'] };\n  }\n\n  // 检查文件大小\n  const stats = fs.statSync(filePath);\n  const maxSize = isCover ? CONFIG.coverMaxSize : CONFIG.inlineMaxSize;\n  if (stats.size > maxSize) {\n    issues.push(`文件过大: ${Math.round(stats.size / 1024)}KB > ${Math.round(maxSize / 1024)}KB`);\n  }\n\n  // 检查尺寸\n  const dimensions = getImageDimensions(filePath);\n  if (dimensions) {\n    const expectedWidth = isCover ? CONFIG.coverWidth : CONFIG.inlineWidth;\n    const expectedHeight = isCover ? CONFIG.coverHeight : CONFIG.inlineHeight;\n\n    // 允许 10% 误差\n    const widthOk = Math.abs(dimensions.width - expectedWidth) / expectedWidth < 0.1;\n    const heightOk = Math.abs(dimensions.height - expectedHeight) / expectedHeight < 0.1;\n\n    if (!widthOk || !heightOk) {\n      issues.push(`尺寸不符: ${dimensions.width}x${dimensions.height} (期望 ${expectedWidth}x${expectedHeight})`);\n    }\n  }\n\n  return { exists: true, issues };\n}\n\nfunction main() {\n  console.log('🔍 图片质量检查');\n  console.log('================');\n  console.log('');\n\n  const tasksPath = path.join(CONFIG.dataDir,                 "command": "create",
                "file_text": "# Gemini 图片生成流水线\n\n为 100 篇博文批量生成封面和内页配图的半自动化流水线。\n\n## 前置依赖\n\n```bash\n# 必需\nbrew install jq          # JSON 处理\n\n# 可选（用于压缩）\nbrew install imagemagick # 图片处理\nbrew install pngquant    # PNG 压缩\n\n# 可选（用于 S3 上传）\nbrew install awscli      # AWS CLI\n```\n\n## 快速开始\n\n### 1. 生成 Prompt\n\n```bash\nnpx tsx scripts/image-pipeline/generate-prompts.ts\n```\n\n输出:\n- `data/image-tasks.json` - 结构化任务数据\n- `data/image-tasks.md` - 可读的 Prompt 清单\n\n### 2. 生成图片\n\n**方式 A: Gemini CLI 批量生成**\n\n```bash\nbash scripts/image-pipeline/batch-generate.sh --all\n```\n\n**方式 B: 网页手工生成**\n\n```bash\n# 导出待处理清单\nnpx tsx scripts/image-pipeline/export-pending.ts\n\n# 打开 data/pending-prompts.md，复制 Prompt 到 Gemini 网页\n# 下载图片到 generated-images/ 目录\n\n# 扫描并标记完成\nnpx tsx scripts/image-pipeline/mark-complete.ts --scan\n```\n\n### 3. 压缩图片\n\n```bash\nbash scripts/image-pipeline/compress-images.sh\n```\n\n### 4. 上传到 S3\n\n```bash\nbash scripts/image-pipeline/upload-to-s3.sh\n```\n\n### 5. 更新 MDX 文件\n\n```bash\n# 预览模式\nnpx tsx scripts/image-pipeline/update-mdx.ts --dry-run\n\n# 实际执行\nnpx tsx scripts/image-pipeline/update-mdx.ts\n```\n\n### 6. 查看进度\n\n```bash\nnpx tsx scripts/image-pipeline/show-progress.ts\n```\n\n### 7. 质量检查\n\n```bash\nnpx tsx scripts/image-pipeline/check-quality.ts\n```\n\n## 目录结构\n\n```\ndraft-code/\n├── scripts/image-pipeline/\n│   ├── generate-prompts.ts   # Prompt 生成\n│   ├── batch-generate.sh     # CLI 批量生成\n│   ├── export-pending.ts     # 导出待处理清单\n│   ├── mark-complete.ts      # 标记完成\n│   ├── compress-images.sh    # 图片压缩\n│   ├── upload-to-s3.sh       # S3 上传\n│   ├── update-mdx.ts         # MDX 更新\n│   ├── show-progress.ts      # 进度显示\n│   ├── check-quality.ts      # 质量检查\n│   └── types.ts              # 类型定义\n├── config/\n│   ├── category-styles.ts    # 分类风格配置\n│   └── prompt-templates.ts   # Prompt 模板\n├── data/\n│   ├── image-tasks.json      # 任务数据\n│   ├── image-tasks.md        # Prompt 清单\n│   └── pending-prompts.md    # 待处理清单\n├── generated-images/         # 生成的原图\n├── compressed/               # 压缩后的图\n└── logs/                     # 生成日志\n```\n\n## 文件命名规范\n\n| 类型 | 格式 | 尺寸 | 大小限制 |\n|------|------|------|----------|\n| 封面 | `{slug}-cover.jpg` | 1200x630 | <200KB |\n| 内页 | `{slug}-{n}.png` | 1000x600 | <150KB |\n\n## 任务状态\n\n- `pending` - 待处理\n- `generated` - 已生成\n- `approved` - 已审核\n- `uploaded` - 已上传\n\n## 分类风格\n\n| 分类 | 风格 | 配色 |\n|------|------|------|\n| 商务汇报 | 极简网格、科技光影 | 深蓝/灰 |\n| 年终总结 | 时间线、稳重 | 暖橙/金 |\n| 教育培训 | 插画人物、卡片 | 绿/蓝/黄 |\n| 产品营销 | 渐变霓虹、情境 | 粉/紫/青 |\n| 项目提案 | 创新、前瞻 | 蓝/绿 |\n| 述职报告 | 专业、稳重 | 深灰/石墨 |\n| 通用技巧 | 信息图、实用 | 蓝/绿/黄 |\n| 付费搜索 | 现代、资源导向 | 紫/粉/青 |\n\n## 常见问题\n\n### Q: Gemini CLI 未安装怎么办？\n\n使用网页手工生成模式：\n1. 运行 `export-pending.ts` 导出 Prompt\n2. 复制到 Gemini 网页生成\n3. 运行 `mark-complete.ts --scan` 更新状态\n\n### Q: 图片文件过大怎么办？\n\n运行压缩脚本：\n```bash\nbash scripts/image-pipeline/compress-images.sh\n```\n\n### Q: 如何只处理特定分类？\n\n编辑 `generate-prompts.ts` 中的过滤逻辑，或手动编辑 `image-tasks.json`。\n\n## 相关文档\n\n- [需求文档](/.kiro/specs/gemini-image-pipeline/requirements.md)\n- [设计文档](/.kiro/specs/gemini-image-pipeline/design.md)\n- [任务列表](/.kiro/specs/gemini-image-pipeline/tasks.md)\n"
              },

.replace(/完整指南$/, '')\n    .trim();\n\n  const matches = cleaned.match(/[\\u4e00-\\u9fa5]{2,6}/g);\n  if (matches && matches.length > 0) {\n    return matches[0] + 'PPT';\n  }\n  return if (entry.isDirectory()) {\n        scanDir(fullPath);\n      } else if (entry.name.endsWith('.zh.mdx')) {\n        try {\n          const task = processFile(fullPath);\n          if (task) style,\n    textStrategy,\n    textToRender,\n  });\n\n  const h2Scenes = extractH2Scenes(body);\n  const inlineImages = h2Scenes.map((scene, i) => {\n    const paragraph = extractParagraphAfterH2(body, scene);\n    const sceneType = detectSceneType(scene, paragraph);\n    const elements = getSceneElements(sceneType, scene);\n\n    return {\n      filename: `${slug}-${i + 1}.png`,\n      scene,\n      sceneType: sceneType as SceneType,\n      prompt: generateInlinePrompt({ scene, sceneType, elements, style }),\n      status: 'pending' as const,\n    };\n  });\n\n  while (inlineImages.length < 3) {\n    const i = inlineImages.length;\n    const defaultScene = `${style.category}核心要点 ${i + 1}`;\n    inlineImages.push({\n      filename: `${slug}-${i + 1}.png`,\n      scene: defaultScene,\n      sceneType: 'concept',\n      prompt: generateInlinePrompt({\n        scene: defaultScene,\n        sceneType: 'concept',\n        elements: style.sceneElements.slice(0, shortTitleEn,\n    category: categoryZh,\n    categoryEn: style.categoryEn,\n    styleHint: style.styleHint,\n    palette: style.palette,\n    keywords,\n    cover: {\n      filename: `${slug}-cover.jpg`,\n      prompt: coverPrompt,\n      textStrategy,\n      textToRender,\n      status: 'pending',\n    },\n    inlineImages,\n    mediaStatus: 'none',\n    createdAt: now,\n    updatedAt: now,\n  };\n}\n\n/**\n * 生成 Markdown 格式的任务清单\n */\nfunction generateMarkdown(tasks: ImageTask[]): string {\n  const lines: string[] = [\n    '# 图片生成任务清单',\n    '',\n    `> 生成时间: ${new Date().toISOString()}`,\n    `> 总任务数: ${tasks.length}`,\n    '',\n    '---',\n    '',\n  ];\n\n  const byCategory = new Map<string, ImageTask[]>();\n  for (const task of tasks) {\n    const cat = (${catTasks.length} 篇)`);\n    lines.push('');\n\n    for (const task of catTasks) {\n      lines.push(`### ${task.title}`);\n      lines.push('');\n      lines.push(`- **Slug**: \\`${task.slug}\\``);\n      lines.push(`- **短标题**: ${task.shortTitleZh}`);\n      lines.push(`- **文字策略**: ${task.cover.textStrategy}`);\n      lines.push('');\n\n      lines.push('#### 封面 Prompt');\n      lines.push('');\n      lines.push('```');\n      lines.push(task.cover.prompt);\n      lines.push('```');\n      lines.push('');\n      lines.push(`**文件名**: \\`${task.cover.filename}\\``);\n      lines.push('');\n\n      lines.push('#### 内页 Prompt');\n      lines.push('');\n      for (const img of task.inlineImages) {\n        lines.push(`**${img.scene}** (\\`${img.filename}\\`)`);\n        lines.push('');\n        lines.push('```');\n        lines.push(img.prompt);\n        lines.push('```');\n        lines.push('');\n      }\n\n      lines.push('---');\n      lines.push('');\n    }\n  }\n\n  return lines.join('\\n');\n}\n\n/**\n * 主函数\n */\nasync function main() {\n  console.log('🚀 开始生成图片 Prompt...');\n  console.log(`📁 MDX 目录: ${CONFIG.mdxDir}`);\n\n  if style,\n    textStrategy,\n    textToRender,\n  });\n\n  const h2Scenes = extractH2Scenes(body);\n  const inlineImages = h2Scenes.map((scene, i) => {\n    const paragraph = while (inlineImages.length < 3) {\n    const i = inlineImages.length;\n    const defaultScene = `${style.category}核心要点 ${i + 1}`;\n    inlineImages.push({\n      filename: `${slug}-${i + 1}.png`,\n     "我来帮你了解这个项目的核心架构和关键点。\n\n## 项目概览\n\n这是一个基于 Next.js 15 的全栈 SaaS 应用，包含：\n- 多语言博客系统（中英文）\n- AI 功能演示（聊天、图片生成、网页内容分析）\n- 完整的用户认证和付费订阅系统\n\n## 核心技术栈\n\n**前端**\n- Next.js 15 App Router + React 19 + TypeScript\n- next-intl 处理国际化（en/zh）\n- TailwindCSS + Radix UI 组件\n- 动画组件在 `src/components/magicui` 和 `src/components/tailark`\n\n**后端**\n- PostgreSQL + Drizzle ORM\n- Better Auth（邮箱验证、社交登录、管理员功能）\n- Stripe（订阅计费）\n- Resend（邮件发送）\n- S3 兼容存储\n\n**AI 能力**\n- ai-sdk 集成多个提供商（OpenAI、Fireworks、Replicate、Fal 等）\n- Firecrawl 网页抓取\n- 支持聊天、图片生成、内容分析\n\n## 目录结构\n\n```\nsrc/\n├── app/          # 路由（营销页、AI 功能、认证、仪表板、API）\n├── components/   # UI 组件、数据表格、营销模块\n├── ai/           # AI 功能实现和配置\n├── actions/      # Server Actions（支付、积分、用户管理）\n├── lib/          # 工具函数、认证配置、常量\n├── db/           # 数据库 schema 和迁移\n├── config/       # 站点配置、价格、导航\n├── storage/      # 存储适配器\n├── mail/         # 邮件模板\n└── credits/      # 积分系统（可选）\n\ncontent/          # MDX 博客和文档\nmessages/         # 翻译文件（en.json, zh.json）\n```\n\n## 快速启动\n\n1. **安装依赖**\n```bash\npnpm install\n```\n\n2. **配置环境变量**\n复制 `env.example` 到 `.env.local`，填写必需的：\n- `DATABASE_URL` - PostgreSQL 连接\n- `BETTER_AUTH_SECRET` - 认证密钥\n- `STRIPE_SECRET_KEY` - Stripe 密钥\n- `RESEND_API_KEY` - 邮件服务\n- AI 提供商的 API keys\n- S3 存储凭证\n\n3. **运行开发服务器**\n```bash\npnpm dev  # 访问 http://localhost:3005\n```\n\n4. **数据库迁移**\n```bash\npnpm db:migrate\n```\n\n## 关键功能模块\n\n**认证流程**\n- 配置在 `src/lib/auth.ts`\n- 支持邮箱验证、GitHub/Google 登录\n- 管理员可在 `/admin/users` 管理用户\n\n**付费订阅**\n- Stripe Checkout/Portal 集成\n- 计划配置在 `src/config/price-config.tsx`\n- 可选积分系统（通过 `websiteConfig.credits.enableCredits` 开关）\n\n**AI 演示**\n- `/ai/chat` - 聊天界面（API: `app/api/chat`）\n- `/ai/image` - 图片生成（API: `app/api/generate-images`）\n- `/ai/text` - 网页内容分析（API: `app/api/analyze-content`）\n\n**内容管理**\n- MDX 驱动的博客在 `content/blog`\n- 文档搜索使用 Fumadocs + Orama（支持中文分词）\n\n## 常用命令\n\n```bash\npnpm lint          # 代码检查和格式化\npnpm db:studio     # 打开数据库管理界面\npnpm content       # 刷新 MDX 元数据\npnpm email         # 预览邮件模板（端口 3333）\n```\n\n## 代码规范\n\n- 使用 Biome 进行 lint（2 空格缩进，单引号）\n- 文件名用 kebab-case，组件用 PascalCase\n- Server Actions 放在 `src/actions`\n- 使用 `safe-action` 包装需要验证的服务端操作\n\n需要深入了解某个具体模块吗？比如认证流程、AI 集成或者数据库设计？\n[Tool uses: none]",

    "完美！现在我理解了这个博客内容创作系统的全貌。让我为你总结：\n\n## 📚 博客内容创作系统 - 完整架构\n\n这是一个为 **PPT 下载站**设计的博客 SEO 优化和内容生产流水线，目标是将 100 篇 PPT 相关博文优化为高质量、SEO 友好的内容。\n\n---\n\n## 🎯 核心目标\n\n1. **AdSense 申请准备** - 生产高质量博客内容\n2. **SEO/GEO 优化** - 符合搜索引擎和生成式 AI 优化标准\n3. **多语言支持** - 中英文双语发布\n4. **可迁移性** - 未来可无缝迁移到 mk-saas 平台\n\n---\n\n## 📊 现有资产\n\n**100 篇 PPT 博文**，分布在 8 个分类：\n- 通用与混合场景（24 篇）\n- 商务汇报 PPT（9 篇）\n- 年终总结 PPT（10 篇）\n- 项目提案 PPT（7 篇）\n- 教育培训与课件 PPT（11 篇）\n- 产品营销与营销方案 PPT（10 篇）\n- 述职报告 PPT（10 篇）\n- 付费模板搜索与产品视角（19 篇）\n\n---\n\n## 🏗️ 系统架构\n\n### **1. 内容生产流水线**（使用 Gemini CLI）\n\n```\n选题池 (topics.json)\n    ↓\n生成大纲 (Outline)\n    ↓\n生成正文 (Content) → 中文 MDX\n    ↓\nAI 翻译 → 英文 MDX\n    ↓\n发布\n```\n\n**关键特性**：\n- 结构化选题库（JSON 格式）\n- 分步生成（大纲 → 正文）确保质量\n- 自动翻译保留 MDX 结构\n\n---\n\n### **2. 图片生成流水线**（Gemini 手工生成）\n\n```\nPhase 1: 内容分析 → 生成 Prompt（脚本自动）\n    ↓\nPhase 2: 人工执行 → 复制 Prompt 到 Gemini 网页生成\n    ↓\nPhase 3: 后处理 → 压缩、复制到 public/images/blog\n    ↓\nPhase 4: 验收 → 检查图片完整性\n```\n\n**产出**：500 张图片（200 封面 + 300 内页）\n\n**图片规范**：\n- 封面：1200x630 < 200KB\n- 内容图：800-1000 宽 < 150KB\n\n---\n\n### **3. 博客处理脚本**（draft-code/）\n\n6 个核心脚本：\n\n```bash\n# 1. 审计 - 检查 Frontmatter、分类、图片等问题\nblog-audit → reports/blog-audit.json\n\n# 2. 修复 - 自动修复 Frontmatter 和内容问题\nblog-fix → 修复后的 MDX\n\n# 3. 翻译 - 中文 → 英文（保留 MDX 结构）\nblog-translate → 英文 MDX\n\n# 4. 图片任务 - 生成 Gemini Prompt\nblog-image-tasks → reports/image-tasks.md\n\n# 5. 同步 - 迁移到正式目录\nblog-sync → content/blog/\n\n# 6. 验收 - 最终质量检查\nblog-validate → 验收报告\n```\n\n---\n\n## 🔧 技术规范\n\n### **Frontmatter 结构**\n\n```yaml\n---\ntitle: \"商务汇报PPT怎么做？完整指南\"\ndescription: \"从结构到演讲的实战技巧\"\nimage: /images/blog/business-report-guide-cover.png\ndate: \"2025-11-27\"\npublished: true\npremium: false\ncategories: [\"business\"]  # 一级分类\ntags: [\"结构设计\", \"实战案例\", \"进阶\"]  # 二级标签\nauthor: \"pptx-team\"\nseoKeywords: [\"商务汇报PPT\", \"工作汇报结构\"]\nrelatedPosts: [\"business-report-tips\", \"ppt-design-guide\"]\n---\n```\n\n### **分类体系**\n\n| 中文分类 | 英文 Slug | 描述 |\n|---------|----------|------|\n| 通用技巧 | `general` | 跨场景的 PPT 制作通用经验 |\n| 商务汇报 | `business` | 商务汇报、工作汇报相关 |\n| 年终总结 | `summary` | 年终总结、年度复盘相关 |\n| 项目提案 | `proposal` | 项目提案、BP、路演相关 |\n| 教育培训 | `education` | 教育培训、课件制作相关 |\n| 产品营销 | `marketing` | 产品营销、营销方案相关 |\n| 述职报告 | `report` | 述职报告、晋升汇报相关 |\n| 模板技巧 | `tips` | 模板选择、搜索、改稿技巧 |\n\n---\n\n## 📁 目录结构\n\n```\n深入细化调整/006-01-博客内容创作/\n├── 博客内容创作设计方案.md          # 总体设计\n├── content-pipeline-design.md       # 流水线设计\n├── topics.json                      # 选题库\n├── prompt-templates.md              # Prompt 模板\n│\n├── 流水线设计-博文生产/              # 博文生产方案\n│   ├── 博客优化综合方案.md\n│   ├── 博客综合处理方案-执行细节.md\n│   └── blog-audit-report.json       #  └── description → 提取画面元素\n\n2. 解析正文 H2 结构\n   ├── 提取所有 ## 标题\n   ├── 过滤通用标题（FAQ/总结/结语）\n   └── 取前 3 个作为内页场景\n\n3. 分析段落类型\n   ├── 检测列表 → 清单卡片图\n   ├── 检测步骤 → 流程图\n   ├── 检测数据 → 图表\n   ├── 检测对比 → 对比图\n elements: string[];      // [\"营销漏斗\", \"产品展示\", \"数据\"]\n    tone: string;           // \"高对比、渐变霓虹\"\n  };\n  coverKeywords: string[];   // [\"产品营销\", \"PPT结构\", \"内容\"]\n  coverElements: string[]; // [\"饼图\", \"用户画像\", \"数据\"]\n  }>;\n}\n```\n\n---\n\n## 🎨 分类风格配置表\n\n| 分类 | 短中文 | 配色 | 风格 | 典型元素 |\n|------|--------|------|------|----------|\n| 商务汇报 | 商务汇报PPT | 深蓝#1E3A5F + 灰 | 极简网格、科技光影 |         "ToolSpecification": {
          "name": "worker_deploy",
          "description": "Deploy or redeploy a Worker script from a local file or content string",
          "input_schema": {
            "json": {
              "properties": {
                "no_observability": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "Disable Worker Logs for this worker"
                },
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "Name of the Worker script to deploy"
                },
                "filePath": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "Path to the Worker script file (mutually exclusive with scriptContent)"
                },
                "compatibility_flags": {
                  "items": {
                    "type": "string"
                  },
                  "description": "Optional array of compatibility flags",
                  "type": "array"
                },
                "skip_workers_dev": {
                  "type": "boolean",
                  "description": "Do not deploy the Worker on your workers.dev subdomain"
                },
                "compatibility_date": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "Optional compatibility date for the Worker (e.g., \"2024-01-01\")"
                },
                "scriptContent": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "Content of the Worker script (mutually exclusive with filePath)"
                },
                "bindings": {
                  "type": "array",
                  "items": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                      "name": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "Name of the binding in the Worker code"
                      },
                      "queue_name": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "Name of the queue (required for queue type)"
                      },
                      "type": {
                        "description": "Type of binding (kv_namespace, r2_bucket, d1_database, service, analytics_engine, queue, durable_object_namespace)",
                        "enum": [
                          "kv_namespace",
                          "r2_bucket",
                          "d1_database",
                          "service",
                          "analytics_engine",
                          "queue",
                          "durable_object_namespace"
                        ],
                        "type": "string"
                      },
                      "service": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "Name of the service (required for service type)"
                      },
                      "dataset": {
                        "description": "Name of the analytics dataset (required for analytics_engine type)",
                        "type": "string"
                      },
                      "bucket_name": {
                        "description": "Name of the R2 bucket (required for r2_bucket type)",
                        "type": "string"
                      },
                      "class_name": {
                        "description": "Name of the Durable Object class (required for durable_object_namespace type)",
                        "type": "string"
                      },
                      "script_name": {
                        "description": "Optional script name for external Durable Object bindings",
                        "type": "string"
                      },
                      "namespace_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "ID of the KV namespace (required for kv_namespace type)"
                      },
                      "database_id": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "ID of the D1 database (required for d1_database type)"
                      }
                    },
                    "required": [
                      "type",
                      "name"
                    ]
                  },
                  "description": "Optional array of resource bindings (KV, R2, D1, etc)"
                }
              },
              "required": [
                "name"
              ],
              "type": "object"
            }
          }
        }

    "DeepGraph Next.js MCP": [
      {
        "ToolSpecification": {
          "name": "finddirectconnections",
          "description": "Explore the immediate relationships of a functionality within the code graph from the repository vercel/next.js. This reveals first-level connections including: parent functionalities that reference this node, child functionalities that this node directly calls or uses, declaration/definition relationships, and usage patterns. Essential for understanding code dependencies and architecture. The repository is represented as a connected graph where each node (function, class, file, etc.) has relationships with other nodes.",
          "input_schema": {
            "json": {
              "properties": {
                "name": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "minLength": 1,
                  "description": "The exact name of the functionality to analyze connections for. Names are case-sensitive. For methods, include the parent class name as 'ClassName.methodName'. Examples: 'processPayment', 'UserController.createUser', 'validateInput'"
                },
                "path": {
                  "description": "The origin file path of the functionality. Critical when multiple functionalities have identical names in different files. Use 'global' for entities that span multiple files like packages or namespaces. Examples: 'src/controllers/payment.controller.ts', 'global', 'utils/validation.js'",
                  "type": "string"
                }
              },
              "type": "object",
              "required": [
                "name"
              ],
              "additionalProperties": false,
              "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#"
            }
          }
        }
      },
      {
        "ToolSpecification": {
          "name": "getcode",
          "description": "Get the complete code implementation of a specific functionality (class, function, method, etc.) from the repository vercel/next.js graph. This is the primary tool for code retrieval and should be prioritized over other tools. The repository is represented as a graph where each node contains code, documentation, and relationships to other nodes. Use this when you need to examine the actual implementation of any code entity.",
          "input_schema": {
            "json": {
              "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#",
              "required": [
                "name"
              ],
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "name": {
                  "description": "The exact name of the functionality to retrieve code for. Names are case-sensitive. For methods, include the parent class name as 'ClassName.methodName'. For nested classes, use 'OuterClass.InnerClass'. Examples: 'getUserById', 'UserService.authenticate', 'DatabaseConnection.connect'",
                  "type": "string",
                  "minLength": 1
                },
                "path": {
                  "description": "The origin file path where the functionality is defined. Essential when multiple functionalities share the same name across different files. Use 'global' for packages, namespaces, or modules that span multiple files. Examples: 'src/services/user.service.ts', 'global', 'lib/utils/helpers.js'",
                  "type": "string"
                }
              },
              "additionalProperties": false
            }
          }
        }
      },
      {
        "ToolSpecification": {
          "name": "nodessemanticsearch",
          "description": "Search for code functionalities across the repository vercel/next.js graph using semantic similarity based on natural language queries. This tool finds relevant functions, classes, methods, and other code entities that match the conceptual meaning of your query, even if they don't contain the exact keywords. Perfect for discovering related functionality, finding similar implementations, or exploring unfamiliar codebases. The search operates on the semantic understanding of code purpose and behavior.",
          "input_schema": {
            "json": {
              "required": [
                "query"
              ],
              "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#",
              "additionalProperties": false,
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "query": {
                  "minLength": 1,
                  "description": "A natural language description of the functionality you're looking for. Be specific about the behavior, purpose, or domain. Examples: 'user authentication and login', 'database connection pooling', 'file upload validation', 'payment processing logic', 'error handling middleware', 'data encryption utilities'",
                  "type": "string"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      },
      {
        "ToolSpecification": {
          "name": "foldertreestructure",
          "description": "Returns the folder tree structure of the given folder path from the repository vercel/next.js graph. Useful to understand what files and subfolders are inside the given folder. To access to a file content, use get-code tool.",
          "input_schema": {
            "json": {
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "path": {
                  "description": "The path to the folder to get the tree structure for. Example: 'src/components'. Leave empty to get the root folder tree structure.",
                  "type": "string"
                }
              },
              "additionalProperties": false,
              "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#"
            }
          }
        }
      },
      {
        "ToolSpecification": {
          "name": "getusagedependencylinks",
          "description": "Generate a comprehensive adjacency list showing all functionalities that would be affected by changes to a specific code entity. This performs deep dependency analysis through the code graph of the repository vercel/next.js to identify the complete impact radius of modifications. Essential for impact analysis, refactoring planning, and understanding code coupling. The result shows which functionalities depend on the target entity either directly or through a chain of dependencies, formatted as 'file_path::functionality_name' pairs.",
          "input_schema": {
            "json": {
              "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#",
              "properties": {
                "path": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "The origin file path where the functionality is defined. Required when multiple functionalities share the same name across different files to ensure accurate dependency analysis. Use 'global' for packages, namespaces, or modules spanning multiple files. Examples: 'src/database/connection.service.ts', 'global', 'lib/validation/input.validator.js'"
                },
                "name": {
                  "description": "The exact name of the functionality to analyze dependencies for. Names are case-sensitive. For methods, include the parent class name as 'ClassName.methodName'. This will be the root node for dependency traversal. Examples: 'DatabaseService.connect', 'validateUserInput', 'PaymentProcessor.processTransaction'",
                  "minLength": 1,

      {
        "ToolSpecification": {
          "name": "fs_read",
          "description": "Tool for reading files, directories and images. Always provide an 'operations' array.\n\nFor single operation: provide array with one element.\nFor batch operations: provide array with multiple elements.\n\nAvailable modes:\n- Line: Read lines from a file\n- Directory: List directory contents\n- Search: Search for patterns in files\n- Image: Read and process images\n\nExamples:\n1. Single: {\"operations\": [{\"mode\": \"Line\", \"path\": \"/file.txt\"}]}\n2. Batch: {\"operations\": [{\"mode\": \"Line\", \"path\": \"/file1.txt\"}, {\"mode\": \"Search\", \"path\": \"/file2.txt\", \"pattern\": \"test\"}]}",
          "input_schema": {
            "json": {
              "type": "object",
              "required": [
                "operations"
              ],
              "properties": {
                "summary": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "Optional description of the purpose of this batch operation (mainly useful for multiple operations)"
                },
                "operations": {
                  "description": "Array of operations to execute. Provide one element for single operation, multiple for batch.",
                  "type": "array",
                  "minItems": 1,
                  "items": {
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                      "path": {
                        "description": "Path to the file or directory. The path should be absolute, or otherwise start with ~ for the user's home (required for Line, Directory, Search modes).",
                        "type": "string"
                      },
                      "image_paths": {
                        "items": {
                          "type": "string"
                        },
                        "description": "List of paths to the images. This is currently supported by the Image mode.",
                        "type": "array"
                      },
                      "start_line": {
                        "type": "integer",
                        "description": "Starting line number (optional, for Line mode). A negative index represents a line number starting from the end of the file.",
                        "default": 1
                      },
                      "end_line": {
                        "description": "Ending line number (optional, for Line mode). A negative index represents a line number starting from the end of the file.",
                        "type": "integer",
                        "default": -1
                      },
                      "pattern": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "Pattern to search for (required, for Search mode). Case insensitive. The pattern matching is performed per line."
                      },
                      "depth": {
                        "description": "Depth of a recursive directory listing (optional, for Directory mode)",
                        "type": "integer",
                        "default": 0
                      },
                      "mode": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "description": "The operation mode to run in: `Line`, `Directory`, `Search`. `Line` and `Search` are only for text files, and `Directory` is only for directories. `Image` is for image files, in this mode `image_paths` is required.",
                        "enum": [
                          "Line",
                          "Directory",
                          "Search",
                          "Image"
                        ]
                      },
                      "context_lines": {

        "ToolSpecification": {
          "name": "web_search",
          "description": "WebSearch looks up information that is outside the model's training data or cannot be reliably inferred from the current codebase/context.\nTool performs basic compliance wrt content licensing and restriction.\nAs an agent you are responsible for adhering to compliance and attribution requirements.\nIMPORTANT: The snippets often contain enough information to answer questions - only use web_fetch if you need more detailed content from a specific webpage.\n\n## When to Use\n- When the user asks for current or up-to-date information (e.g., pricing, versions, technical specs) or explicitly requests a web search.\n- When verifying information that may have changed recently, or when the user provides a specific URL to inspect.\n\n## When NOT to Use\n- When the question involves basic concepts, historical facts, or well-established programming syntax/technical documentation.\n- When the topic does not require current or evolving information.\n- If the query concerns non-coding topics (e.g., news, current affairs, religion, economics, society). You must not invoke this tool.\n\nFor any code-related tasks, follow this order:\n1. Search within the repository (if tools are available) and check if it can be inferred from existing code or documentation.\n2. Use this tool only if still unresolved and the library/data is likely new/unseen.\n\n## Content Compliance Requirements\nYou MUST adhere to strict licensing restrictions and attribution requirements when using search results:\n\n### Attribution Requirements\n- ALWAYS provide inline links to original sources using format: [description](url)\n- If not possible to provide inline link, add sources at the end of file\n- Ensure attribution is visible and accessible\n\n### Verbatim Reproduction Limits\n- NEVER reproduce more than 30 consecutive words from any single source\n- Track word count per source to ensure compliance\n- Always paraphrase and summarize rather than quote directly\n- Add compliance note when the content from the source is rephrased: \"Content was rephrased for compliance with licensing restrictions\"\n\n### Content Modification Guidelines\n- You MAY paraphrase, summarize, and reformat content\n- You MUST NOT materially change the underlying substance or meaning\n- Preserve factual accuracy while condensing information\n- Avoid altering core arguments, data, or conclusions\n\n## Usage Details\n- You may rephrase user queries to improve search effectiveness\n- You can make multiple queries to gather comprehensive information\n- Consider breaking complex questions into focused searches\n- Refine queries based on initial results if needed\n\n## Output Usage\n- Prioritize latest published sources based on publishedDate\n- Prefer official documentation to blogs and news posts\n- Use domain information to assess source authority and reliability\n\n## Error Handling\n- If unable to comply with content restrictions, explain limitations to user\n- Suggest alternative approaches when content cannot be reproduced\n- Prioritize compliance over completeness when conflicts arise\n\n## Output\nThe tool returns a JSON object with a \"results\" array containing search results:\n\n{\n  \"results\": [\n    {\n      \"title\": \"Example Page Title\",\n      \"url\": \"https://example.com/page\",\n      \"snippet\": \"Brief excerpt from the page...\",\n      \"publishedDate\": \"2025-11-20T10:30:00Z\",\n      \"domain\": \"example.com\",\n      \"id\": \"unique-id-123\",\n      \"maxVerbatimWordLimit\": 30,\n      \"publicDomain\": false\n    }\n  ]\n}\n\n## UI FROM LLM (You) back to the user\nCRITICAL: Always start your response with \"Here's what I found:\" and then start from a newline.\nALWAYS end your response with a blank line followed by 'References:' and list the sources you used in sequential order [1], [2], [3], etc. with NO gaps in numbering. Format: '[N] Title - URL' one per line. Truncate long titles to 80 characters and long URLs to 100 characters, adding '...' if truncated.",
          "input_schema": {
            "json": {
              "required": [
                "query"
              ],
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "query": {
                  "type": "string",
                  "description": "Search query - can be keywords, questions, or specific topics"
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      },

        "ToolSpecification": {
          "name": "fs_write",
          "description": "A tool for creating and editing files\n * The `create` command will override the file at `path` if it already exists as a file, and otherwise create a new file\n * The `append` command will add content to the end of an existing file, automatically adding a newline if the file doesn't end with one. The file must exist.\n Notes for using the `str_replace` command:\n * The `old_str` parameter should match EXACTLY one or more consecutive lines from the original file. Be mindful of whitespaces!\n * If the `old_str` parameter is not unique in the file, the replacement will not be performed. Make sure to include enough context in `old_str` to make it unique\n * The `new_str` parameter should contain the edited lines that should replace the `old_str`.",
